name: Ihuykatumu
guide: [[Resurface]]: after all the dodging, there will be a donut AOE around the [[Ihuykatumu Flytrap]] add
[[Song of the Punutiy]]: the tethers don't really matter, just spread the AOE telegraphs
When the boss moves to one side of the arena, stack behind him to avoid [[Sneeze]]
After the boss's forearms are empowered, [[Blade]] becomes a donut AOE focused on the tank
[[Windwhistle]]: move with the whirlwinds to remain in safe zones
